content.query:
SELECT TOP 10
    ren.SourceSystemTransactionID AS TransactionID,
    cust.CustomerSK AS CustomerSK,
    mov.MovieSK AS MovieSK,
    rendat.DateSK AS RentalDateSK,
    retdat.DateSK AS ReturnDateSK,
    CASE
        WHEN DATEDIFF(d, ren.RentalDate, ren.ReturnDate) < 0 THEN NULL
        ELSE DATEDIFF(d, ren.RentalDate, ren.ReturnDate)
    END AS RentalDuration,
    ren.RentalCost,
    ren.LateFee,
    ren.RentalCost + ren.LateFee AS TotalCost,
    ren.RewindFlag
FROM
    [ext].[rentals] ren
LEFT JOIN
    [dbo].[DimDate] rendat
    ON ren.RentalDate = rendat.DateValue
LEFT JOIN
    [dbo].[DimDate] retdat
    ON ren.ReturnDate = retdat.DateValue
LEFT JOIN
    [dbo].[DimCustomers] cust
    ON ren.CustomerID = cust.CustomerID	
LEFT JOIN
    [dbo].[DimMovies] mov
    ON ren.MovieID = mov.MovieID
